course_title: Special Topics in Psychology: American Films of the 1970s
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 13 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Prior completion of PSYC 110, or PSYC 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology. Topic Title: American Films of the 1970s: Individualist versus Collectivist Identities.  The class will meet in PAIS 493.
course_description: A series of special topics of concern to the discipline of psychology. Content will vary in successive offerings. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
schedule_location: M 11:30am-1pm in New Psyc Bldg 493 (36 Eagle Ro
